about_the_game:
Gates of Yomi is a roguelite bullet heaven where you play as a group of elite warriors in feudal Japan who will fight through hordes of haunting spirits and yokai in the land of the dead, Yomi. Defeat mythical monsters and venture deep within to unearth the mystery within this land.

FIGHT YOUR WAY THROUGH YOMI

A living being has no business in the land of the dead. Gather mystical items and spells to fight your way through the endless horde of haunting spirits and yokai.

FACEOFF AGAINST MYTHICAL MONSTER

Powerful creatures will stand in your way as you disrupt their territory. Defeat the legendary yokai of each zone to go deeper where you will face stronger threats until you reach the very depth of this barren land.

RECRUIT MORE WARRIORS

You are not alone in your journey. Unlock different characters with distinct abilities to spice up your gameplay. Befriend and learn more about their story and why they are here.

RECEIVES BLESSING FROM THE DEITIES OF TAKAMAGAHARA

Prove your strength and valor in combat to earn favors and receive blessings from the great deities of the Shinto pantheon. You will earn great power with the help from the high heaven to venture deeper into Yomi.

DEATH IS NOT THE END

A mysterious power brings you back to the land of the living after perishing in Yomi. Gather up coins to upgrade your roster of different heroes and come back again better prepared

PLAY DIFFERENTLY EVERY RUN

A large pool of different items, spells, characters, and gods’ blessings will turn every run into a unique experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Gates of Yomi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gates of Yomi is a roguelite bullet heaven where you play as a group of elite warriors in feudal Japan who will fight through hordes of haunting spirits and yokai in the land of the dead, Yomi. Defeat mythical monsters and venture deep within to unearth the mystery within this land.
